title: SHOW TABLES command: New column is_dynamic | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_03 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The output of the SHOW TABLES command, when displaying Dynamic tables, behaves as follows:
The output of SHOW TABLES does not include dynamic table rows and the is_dynamic column.

The output of SHOW TABLES includes dynamic table rows and the is_dynamic column, defined
as follows:
Y if the table is a dynamic table; otherwise, N.
The kind column in the output of SHOW TABLES displays TABLE for dynamic tables.
